data.name: textBox8.Text
textBox7.Text
data.value:
drop database if exists `crazykart`; create database crazykart; use crazykart;DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `cassa`; CREATE TABLE `cassa` ( `id` int(8) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `doc_id` int(8) NOT NULL, `sum` double DEFAULT '0', `sign` int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `idoc` (`doc_id`), KEY `idate` (`date`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=668 DEFAULT CHARSET=cp1251; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `certificate`; CREATE TABLE `certificate` ( `id` int(8) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `c_id` int(8) DEFAULT NULL, `bar_number` varchar(15) NOT NULL, `user_id` int(8) DEFAULT NULL, `count` int(3) DEFAULT NULL, `created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `modified` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `date_end` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `active` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `ibar` (`bar_number`), KEY `ic` (`c_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=43 DEFAULT CHARSET=cp1251; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `certificate_type`; CREATE TABLE `certificate_type` ( `id` int(8) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `nominal` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `cost` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `created` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `deleted` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `c_type` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=10 DEFAULT CHARSET=cp1251; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `fuel`; CREATE TABLE `fuel` ( `id` int(8) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `car_id` int(8) DEFAULT NULL, `fuel` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `created` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `sign` int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `comment` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `icar` (`car_id`,`created`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=228 DEFAULT CHARSET=cp1251; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `groups`; CREATE TABLE `groups` ( `id` int(8) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `sale` varchar(3) DEFAULT NULL, `created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `modified` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=cp1251; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `jurnal`; CREATE TABLE `jurnal` ( `id` int(8) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `tp` int(2) NOT NULL, `comment` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `created` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `race_id` int(8) NOT NULL, `user_id` int(8) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `irace` (`race_id`), KEY `iuser` (`user_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=1140 DEFAULT CHARSET=cp1251; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `karts`; CREATE TABLE `karts` ( `id` int(8) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `number` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `transponder` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `color` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `repair` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `message_id` int(8) DEFAULT NULL, `wait` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `itransponder` (`transponder`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=14 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
LOCK TABLES `karts` WRITE; INSERT INTO `karts` VALUES (1,'Коля','1','1','','2011-02-16 13:03:30','2011-02-16 13:03:30',0,70,0),(2,'Петя','2','2','','2011-02-16 13:10:59','2011-02-16 13:10:59',0,80,0),(3,'Вася','3','3','','2011-02-16 18:19:43','2011-02-16 18:19:43',0,33,0),(4,NULL,'4','4','','2011-02-18 22:25:11','2011-02-18 22:25:11',0,79,0),(13,'5','5','5',NULL,'2011-03-10 11:01:38',NULL,0,51,0),(6,NULL,'6','6','','2011-02-18 22:25:23','2011-02-18 22:25:23',0,56,0),(7,NULL,'7','7','','2011-02-18 22:25:26','2011-02-18 22:25:26',0,100,0),(8,NULL,'8','8','','2011-02-18 22:25:29','2011-02-18 22:25:29',0,27,0),(9,NULL,'9','9','','2011-02-18 22:25:32','2011-02-18 22:25:32',0,97,0),(12,'10','10','10',NULL,'2011-03-10 10:57:28',NULL,0,NULL,0); UNLOCK TABLES; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `logins`; CREATE TABLE `logins` ( `id` int(8) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_id` int(8) DEFAULT NULL, `stat` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `created` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `iuser` (`user_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=753 DEFAULT CHARSET=cp1251; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `messages`; CREATE TABLE `messages` ( `id` int(8) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `o_id` int(8) NOT NULL, `o_type` int(3) NOT NULL, `m_type` int(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `message` text, `created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `modified` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `subject` varchar(150) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `iobject` (`o_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=102 DEFAULT CHARSET=cp1251; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `noracekart`; CREATE TABLE `noracekart` ( `id` int(8) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `transponder` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `race_id` int(8) DEFAULT NULL, `created` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `itransponder` (`transponder`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=559 DEFAULT CHARSET=cp1251; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `prices`; CREATE TABLE `prices` ( `id` int(8) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `week` int(2) NOT NULL, `d1` text, `d2` text, `d3` text, `d4` text, `d5` text, `d6` text, `d7` text, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=14 DEFAULT CHARSET=cp1251; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `program_users`; CREATE TABLE `program_users` ( `id` int(8) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `login` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `password` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `stat` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `modified` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `deleted` int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` varchar(60) DEFAULT NULL, `surname` varchar(60) DEFAULT NULL, `barcode` varchar(15) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `icode` (`barcode`), KEY `ilogin` (`login`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=cp1251; LOCK TABLES `program_users` WRITE; INSERT INTO `program_users` VALUES (1,'admin','EZVf1en9AAw=',2,'2011-03-16 10:58:34','2011-04-20 07:54:18',0,'','','1111111111'); UNLOCK TABLES; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `race_data`; CREATE TABLE `race_data` ( `id` int(12) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `race_id` int(8) DEFAULT NULL, `pilot_id` int(8) DEFAULT NULL, `car_id` int(8) DEFAULT NULL, `created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `modified` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `reserv` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', `monthrace` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', `race_month_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `light_mode` int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `irace` (`race_id`), KEY `ipilot` (`pilot_id`), KEY `icar` (`car_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=910 DEFAULT CHARSET=cp1251; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `race_times`; CREATE TABLE `race_times` ( `id` int(14) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `member_id` int(8) DEFAULT NULL, `lap` int(3) DEFAULT NULL, `seconds` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `created` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `imember` (`member_id`,`seconds`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=5396 DEFAULT CHARSET=cp1251; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `race_type`; CREATE TABLE `race_type` ( `id` int(8) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `race_type` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, `race_end` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, `race_time` int(4) DEFAULT NULL, `race_laps` int(3) DEFAULT NULL, `pilot_min` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, `pilot_max` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, `warm_laps` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, `gender` int(2) DEFAULT '0', `created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `age_limit` int(2) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=7 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `races`; CREATE TABLE `races` ( `id` int(8) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `racedate` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `raceid` varchar(6) NOT NULL, `created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `modified` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `stat` int(3) DEFAULT '0', `track_id` int(8) NOT NULL, `light_mode` int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `races` (`raceid`,`racedate`), KEY `idate` (`created`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=484 DEFAULT CHARSET=cp1251; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `settings`; CREATE TABLE `settings` ( `id` int(8) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `val` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `description` varchar(254) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=1551 DEFAULT CHARSET=cp1251; LOCK TABLES `settings` WRITE; INSERT INTO `settings` VALUES (1529,'race_time','5',NULL),(1530,'stop_on_pause','True',NULL),(1531,'decoder','AMB20',NULL),(1532,'time_start','10',NULL),(1533,'print_check','False',NULL),(1534,'enter_password','False',NULL),(1535,'rs232_port','COM4',NULL),(1536,'show_zero_lap','True',NULL),(1537,'print_result','True',NULL),(1538,'track_length','1000',NULL),(1539,'show_events','True',NULL),(1540,'time_end','23',NULL),(1541,'card_user','False',NULL),(1542,'default_track','17',NULL),(1543,'start_after_detection','False',NULL),(1544,'printer_check','HP Deskjet D4200 series',NULL),(1545,'sertificat_day','30',NULL),(1546,'wrap_pos','1',NULL),(1547,'printer_result','HP Deskjet D4200 series',NULL),(1548,'fuel_on_lap','0,33',NULL),(1549,'noise_time','20',NULL),(1550,'time_wrap','True',NULL); UNLOCK TABLES; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `tracks`; CREATE TABLE `tracks` ( `id` int(8) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `length` double DEFAULT NULL, `file` text, `created` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=19 DEFAULT CHARSET=cp1251; LOCK TABLES `tracks` WRITE; INSERT INTO `tracks` VALUES (18,'Короткая',1000,'C:\\Documents and Settings\\All Users\\Документы\\Мои рисунки\\Образцы рисунков\\Водяные лилии.jpg','2011-03-14 08:08:19'),(17,'Длинная',1000,'C:\\Documents and Settings\\All Users\\Документы\\Мои рисунки\\Образцы рисунков\\Закат.jpg','2011-03-14 12:23:22'); UNLOCK TABLES; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `user_cash`; CREATE TABLE `user_cash` ( `id` int(8) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `doc_id` int(8) NOT NULL, `user_id` int(8) DEFAULT NULL, `sum` double DEFAULT '0', `sign` int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `created` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `iuser` (`user_id`), KEY `idoc` (`doc_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=37 DEFAULT CHARSET=cp1251; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `users`; CREATE TABLE `users` ( `id` int(8) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(40) DEFAULT NULL, `surname` varchar(40) DEFAULT NULL, `gender` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '1', `birthday` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `created` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `modified` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `nickname` varchar(40) DEFAULT NULL, `banned` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', `date_banned` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `email` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `tel` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `gr` int(3) DEFAULT NULL, `message_id` int(8) DEFAULT NULL, `barcode` varchar(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `icode` (`barcode`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=20041 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
